Text: Fw EPRMOriginal Message From Dave Hall To Sent Tuesday September PM Subject EPRM Dear Mr Clewlow Thanks for your piece on Var for inclusion in the October edition of Energy Power Risk Management The article is attached There are a few queries from the editor and myself written in bold in the text You might find that some parts of the piece have been edited to conform to our house style etc Comments and suggestions welcome Should we send this article to anybody else for their approval Thanks and kind regards Dave Hall Chief Subeditor Energy Power Risk Management magazine Risk Waters Group Haymarket House Haymarket London SWY RX UK Tel Fax Vardoc
